Independence High School Chapter

Our Founding Chapter

About Our Chapter

The Independence High School chapter is the founding chapter of the Paizo Chamber Ensemble. Established by passionate student musicians, this chapter has been instrumental in building our community and spreading the love of chamber music.

Our members come from diverse musical backgrounds and are united by their passion for performing, teaching, and sharing music with the community.

Join us as Paizo performs a warm selection of holiday favorites to bring cheer to the residents. We'll play a short, festive program designed for a cozy, engaging afternoon of seasonal music.

Free Tutoring Available!

Our Independence High School chapter offers completely free music tutoring to students of all ages and skill levels. Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your technique, our experienced student tutors are here to help you grow as a musician.

Instrument Lessons

Violin, viola, cello, piano, and more

Music Theory

Learn scales, chords, and composition

Ensemble Coaching

Group practice and performance prep

Sign Up for Free Tutoring

Chapter Activities

Weekly Rehearsals

Regular practice sessions to prepare for performances

Community Performances

Free concerts and performances for the local community

Tutoring Program

Free music lessons for students of all ages
